|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Black |revision = (Rev C) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/26/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/BeagleBone_Black_(Rev_C) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM3358;(AM3358BZCZ100); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-S100; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 MiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D2516EC4BXGCB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;LAN8710A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 50:72:24
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.04;; |stockos = Linux;3.8.13-bone47;Debian 7.4;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |jtag = optional
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro HDMI, Micro SD Card slot, GPIO, I2C, SPI, CAN Bus, |addchip = Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1;,,, 4 Channel ESD Solution for USB;Texas Instruments;TPD4S012DRY;;2;,,, 500ma Low Noise Voltage Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL5209D;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2051BDGN;;1;,,, Single Positive-edge-triggered D-type Flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G74DCT;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN47LVC2G241DCU;;1;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G06DCK;;1;,,, 32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT-I/OT;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G07DCKR;;1;,,, ESD Protection Diode for HDMI;NXP;IP4283CZ10;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.8.2 |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2014 |estprice = 55 |upc = 640522710690 |ean = 0640522710690 |newegg = 9SIAKBE9CZ9324 |asin = B012TW5C7M |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B *Expansion connectors
Micro HDMI output {{see also|BeagleBoard|List of SBCs}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/texasinstruments/texasinstruments_beagleboneblack |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/texas_instruments/beaglebone_black |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=58808 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.5 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
